FuncDef: This command configures match criteria for the DHCP filter policy entry.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the DHCP option number. Values-0 to 255.
Specifies that the related DHCP option must be present.
Specifies that the related DHCP option must be absent.
The option must partially match a specified hex string. Values-0x0 to 0xFFFFFFFF (up to 254 hex nibbles).
The option must partially match a specified ASCII string, up to 127 characters.
This option requires an exact match of a hex or ASCII string.
Requires the option not to partially match.
